title: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: The Open Type dialog in JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', etc. These obfuscated classes are currently appearing prominently in the dialog.
OB: The obfuscated classes are showing up prominently in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The obfuscated classes should be less prominent in the Open Type dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the IDE
2. Go to the Open Type dialog
3. Observe that the obfuscated classes are appearing prominently
